name: Animal Run (Dr The Per)
description:
Objectif:
Swipe Left and Right to Eat or Beat the Animals can and to
Avoid the Anims you can't.

- Zebra Eats Grass
- Deer Eats Grass and Beats Zebra
- Fox Eats Zebra and Dear
- Wolf Eats Zebra and Deer and Beats Fox
- Lion Eats Zebra and Deer and Beats Fox
